A diferencia de muchos comentarios, a mi me parece un precio ideal tomando en cuenta que son 19 kilos distribuidos en 4 paquetes correctamente sellados y listos para usarse. Esto comparando el precio que maneja el paquete de 9 kilos que venden en Petco y otras tiendas de mascotas. El plus es que llega a tu domicilio y evitas salir.

text:
While the brand itself is more than adequate, someone owes me 4lbs of litter or an apology.

The picture and purchase order note this as a 42lb item, but what I received was the clearly marked 38lb version. With multiple cats, I select their requisite supplies with intention and expect to get what I pay for, or at least what the receipt acknowledges that I‚Äôve purchased.

However annoyed I might be with the above, this litter clumps firmly and maintains a low odor with regular maintenance. It‚Äôs a soft clay, and my beasts are not shy about marching into the cathouse to leave their mark, cover their tracks and scamper away from the scene of the crime. They don‚Äôt show signs of discomfort or paw irritation after years of use; unfortunately they manage to track small amounts out of the box in their haste to get prowling. Grits happen. ;)

text: Easier for me to carry when separated, hurt myself bringing it in. But the price is right.

title: That it's one bag not separated into smaller bags.

text: Received a torn bag and therefore, a good amount of litter had already leaked from the box.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 8 de agosto de 2020
title: Bad shipping

text: Best deal on Scoopaway I've seen, bought 2. This vender ships via USPS so it will take a little longer but the deal was worth the wait. In my opinion Scoopaway is the second best litter on the market, I've tried them ALL, Freshstep is the best but more expensive.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 17 de julio de 2020
title: Best deal I've seen on Scoopaway

text:
It has a pleasant scent, minimal dust and absorbs well. My only beef is the dang bag is heavy! The built in handle has not ever failed me either so that's a plus. I wish they would lower the price tho, its WAY to high for cat litter. I watch my local stores and Amazon and buy from whomever has the lower price.
3 stars off for the price gouge!
Today I bought 3 bags from a local store at $12.99 for the 42 pound bag
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 3 de julio de 2020
title: great litter, minimal dust but WAY overpriced
